#summary Installing a raw printer driver on Ubuntu using gnome system-config-printer
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support

= Introduction =

Here are step-by-step instructions for setting up raw printing on Ubuntu. These steps proved successful in getting the jZebra Applet to print to a raw printer queue from a web page loaded on Ubuntu 9.10 in Firefox. _Last tested 11/06/2009, Ubuntu 9.10, CUPS 1.3.8._ [http://fatbuttlarry.blogspot.com/2009/11/raw-printing-from-ubuntu-910-zebra.html (mirror)]

= Steps =
`Ubuntu 9.10`


  # From the desktop, click "*System --> Administration --> Printing*" <br>[http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU05p2LY3I/AAAAAAAAARw/dOBH7_Bi44U/s400/1.png]<br><br>
  # Click "*New*" (Printer) <br>[http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU05szIyqI/AAAAAAAAARo/E6JRqbDVhcY/s400/2.png]<br><br>
  # Be patient while Ubuntu searches for printers... <br>[http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU05QgtgyI/AAAAAAAAARg/oQkNRrSYPb0/s400/3.png]<br><br>
  # Select "*Network Printer --> AppSocket/HP JetDirect*". For host, put the IP address or hostname of your printer.  Port is usually default of 9100. Click "*Forward*" <br>
  || *Note:* If the printer is locally attached to the client system, we should not be selecting a network printer, instead the correct port. ||
[http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU0xh3mRaI/AAAAAAAAARY/IOkWdck2OCo/s400/4.png]<br><br>
  # Select printer make "*Generic*".  Click "*Forward*". <br>[http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU0xbQgGFI/AAAAAAAAARQ/TkK8DZTewg0/s400/5.png]<br><br>
  # Click model "*Raw*", Drivers "*Generic Raw Queue [en]*".  Click "*Forward*". <br>[http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU0xVFE02I/AAAAAAAAARI/LwQp4LaGsLk/s400/6.png]<br><br>
  # Name the printer appropriately such as "*zebra*".  Click "*Apply*". <br>[http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU0xNaWrqI/AAAAAAAAARA/bFV_ln9vjrg/s400/7.png]<br><br>
  # Your new printer "zebra" should now list.  You can now use this as a raw print queue. <br>[http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_9hmP3Ho0t14/SvU0w2PZVrI/AAAAAAAAAQ4/5541dsaKfMI/s400/8.png]<br><br>
  # End of Steps

-Tres
